messages.content: What is Souqcoom?
Souqcoom is an e-commerce platform providing marketing services for products, goods, and services across the MENA region.
Who is considered a Partner in this program?
A Partner is an individual or entity participating in the partnership program.
What is the minimum age requirement for Partners?
Partners must be at least 18 years old.
What are the age requirements for partners?
Partners must be at least 18 years old.
How are commissions paid to partners?
Commissions are paid to partners based on performance and meeting offer conditions.
What are the payment methods for commissions?
Commissions are paid through the company's approved payment methods.
What are the approved payment methods for the company?
The company’s approved payment methods are scheduled monthly, with payment no later than the last day of the calendar month or as agreed upon between the parties.
Who is responsible for paying taxes on commissions?
Partners are responsible for paying any applicable taxes on commissions in accordance with local and international laws.
What is the company's exclusive property related to marketing?
Marketing materials, trademarks, and tools provided by Sooqkom are the company’s exclusive property.
What must partners do with Sooqkom's proprietary information?
Partners must keep proprietary information related to Sooqkom confidential.
What is required before using Sooqkom's trademark in any marketing campaign?
Written consent from Sooqkom must be obtained before using the company’s trademark in any marketing campaign.
What is prohibited in terms of actions that could affect Sooqkom?
Actions that could harm the company’s reputation or trademark are prohibited
What is Sooqkom committed to?
Sooqkom is committed to dealing with companies that offer products and services meeting approved quality standards.
What is the return policy duration for customers?
The return policy allows customers to return products within 14 days of purchase.
Who bears the return shipping costs?
Customers bear the return shipping costs unless the product is defective or shipped incorrectly.
Who is responsible for shipping costs?
The customer is responsible for shipping costs unless the product is defective or shipped incorrectly.
Who processes refunds?
Sooqkom’s team processes refunds.
What are customers responsible for regarding transfer fees?
Customers are responsible for any transfer fees resulting from using different payment gateways.
Who is not liable for delays or failures caused by circumstances beyond its control?
Sooqkom is not liable for delays or failures caused by circumstances beyond its control.
What are some examples of circumstances beyond Sooqkom's control?
Some examples of circumstances beyond Sooqkom's control include natural disasters, pandemics, wars, economic crises, or regulatory changes.
How should disputes be resolved according to the given policy?
Disputes should first be resolved amicably. If unresolved, arbitration or mediation will be pursued in accordance with the applicable country’s laws.
Who can modify the terms and conditions?
Sooqkom can modify the terms and conditions.
How much advance notice will partners receive before changes to terms and conditions?
Partners will receive at least 30 days advance notice before changes to terms and conditions.
What can partners do if they do not agree with the modifications?
If partners do not agree with the modifications, they may terminate their participation in the program.
What is Sooqkom committed to protecting?
Sooqkom is committed to protecting customer and partner data.
What are partners prohibited from doing with data?
Partners are prohibited from sharing data with third parties or using it for unlawful purposes.
What measures will Sooqkom take to ensure data security?
Sooqkom will take all necessary measures to ensure data security in compliance with international standards.
What actions are considered unethical or offensive on social media platforms?
Using unethical methods or offensive content on social media platforms or the internet is considered unethical or offensive.
What must partners do when the company expands into new markets?
Partners must comply with any new legal requirements when expanding into new markets, including local intellectual property laws.
What advertising practices must partners adhere to?
Partners must adhere to the company’s advertising guidelines and avoid misleading advertisements or those causing harm to the company or customers.
What is required for online advertising compliance?
Compliance with online advertising laws in the countries where marketing occurs is required.
Who is responsible for adhering to tax requirements?
Partners are responsible for adhering to all local and international tax requirements related to their business activities.
What happens in case of an agreement violation?
In case of agreement violation by either party, the other party has the right to terminate the agreement after prior notice.
What must partners comply with in terms of e-commerce laws?
Partners must comply with all local and international e-commerce laws, including consumer protection and personal data protection regulations.
What laws must partners follow to protect personal data?
Partners must comply with all laws related to protecting users’ and customers’ personal data, such as GDPR or relevant local laws.
What measures must Sooqkom take to verify identities?
Sooqkom will take all necessary measures to effectively verify the identities of users.
What measures will Sooqkom take to verify identities?
Sooqkom will take all necessary measures to effectively verify the identities of users and customers to prevent fraudulent activities.
What must partners do regarding shipping and delivery policies?

Partners must inform customers about shipping and delivery policies, including costs, expected delivery times, and available shipping options, and comply with international and local shipping and delivery regulations.
What should partners adhere to regarding paid online advertising?
Partners must adhere to Sooqkom’s policies for paid online advertising and avoid unlawful or prohibited advertising practices, such as misleading ads or promoting illegal products.
What is the goal of Sooqcom's partnership program?
The goal of Sooqcom's partnership program is to provide innovative and comprehensive marketing opportunities for partners.
What is Sooqcom?
Sooqcom is an electronic commerce platform that provides marketing services for products, goods, and services in the Middle East and North Africa.
What practices should be avoided in paid online advertising?
Practices such as misleading ads or promoting illegal products should be avoided in paid online advertising.
What is سوقكم?
سوقكم is an electronic commerce platform that offers marketing services for products, goods, and services in the Middle East and North Africa.
What are the age requirements for a partner in سوقكم?
The partner must be at least 18 years old.
When does a partner receive payments from سوقكم?
The partner receives payments based on performance and achieving offer conditions.
How are the commissions paid to the partner?
The commissions are paid to the partner based on performance and achieving offer conditions.
What is the minimum amount for withdrawal?
The minimum amount for withdrawal is 50 US dollars or as agreed.
Who is responsible for paying any taxes on the commissions?
The partner is responsible for paying any taxes on the commissions according to local and international laws.
Who owns the tools provided by سوقكم?
The tools provided by سوقكم are exclusively owned by the company.
What should the partner do before using the company's trademark?
The partner should obtain written approval from سوقكم before using the company's trademark.
What is prohibited when using سوقكم's trademark in marketing campaigns?
It is prohibited to use methods that may harm the company's reputation or its trademark.
What is the return policy for products on سوقكم?

The return policy allows customers to return products within 14 days of purchase, as long as the products are in their original condition, unused, and accompanied by all original packaging and labels.
What exceptions are there to the return policy?
The return policy does not apply to certain products such as those that cannot be returned for health or hygiene reasons (e.g., opened or used products).
Who bears the costs of return shipping?
The customer bears the return shipping costs, unless the product is defective or shipped incorrectly.
Who bears the cost of returns?
The customer bears the cost of shipping unless the product is defective or shipped incorrectly.
How is the refund processed?
The refund is processed after the product is received and inspected by the team.
What is the responsibility of the client regarding payment?
The client is responsible for any fees resulting from using different payment gateways.
What are some examples of external factors that may affect operations?
External factors such as natural disasters, epidemics, wars, economic crises, or changes in laws.
What steps should be taken to resolve disputes?
First, attempt to resolve disputes amicably. If that is not possible, resort to arbitration or mediation in accordance with the relevant state laws.
What rights does سوقكم company have regarding changes to the agreement?
سوقكم company retains the right to amend the terms and conditions with prior notification to the partner.
What is the minimum notice period required to inform a partner about changes?
The minimum notice period required to inform a partner about changes is 30 days.
What can a partner do if they do not agree with the changes?
If a partner does not agree with the changes, they can terminate their participation in the program.
What is the fee for obtaining a permanent membership?
The fee for obtaining a permanent membership is $2,000.
What is GDPR?
GDPR is a regulation that ensures the protection of personal data for all individuals within the European Union and the European Economic Area.
What are the prohibited activities mentioned in the text?

The prohibited activities include using speculative or illegal marketing methods, presenting false information about products or the company, manipulating survey results for illegal profits, and using unethical content or abusive language on social media platforms or the internet.
What measures does the market commit to when handling data?
The market commits to taking all necessary measures to ensure the security and protection of data according to international standards.
What happens when the company expands into new markets?
When the company expands into new markets, the partner will be notified of additional partnership requirements for those areas.
What legal requirements must the partner adhere to when expanding into new markets?
The partner must adhere to any new legal requirements determined by the expansion into new markets, including local intellectual property laws.
What is the partner responsible for regarding tax requirements?
The partner is responsible for complying with all local and international tax requirements related to their business activities.
What is the partner required to ensure in terms of regulations?
The partner is required to ensure compliance with all relevant market laws.
What happens if one party breaches the agreement?
If one party breaches the agreement, the other party has the right to terminate the agreement after prior notice.
What standards must the partner follow for protecting customer data?
The partner must follow approved standards for protecting customer data, such as GDPR or any relevant local laws.
What should the partner do regarding customer data protection?
The partner should follow adopted standards to protect customer data, such as using encryption technologies in payment and transaction processes.
What must the partner ensure regarding cookies?
The partner must ensure clear notifications to customers about the use of cookies, including the purpose of their use.
What measures should the market take for user identification?
The market should take all necessary measures to effectively verify the identity of users and customers to prevent any fraudulent activities.
What does the partner need to ensure?
The partner needs to ensure the compliance with international and local shipping and delivery laws.
What should the partner avoid when using online paid advertising policies?
The partner should avoid using illegal or prohibited advertising methods, such as misleading ads or those promoting illegal products.
What are the two main parties involved in the agreement?
The two main parties involved in the agreement are the company and the partner.
